    <PropertyValue>// **************************************************
// Custom code for ARInvoiceForm
// Created: 8/16/2018 1:28:27 PM
// **************************************************
//
//	REVISION LOG
//
//	eb1 05/11/20	eric blackwelder @ cdi
//					delete duplicate lines caused by sales kit 
//					being split into multiple shipments
//
// **************************************************


extern alias Erp_Contracts_BO_ARInvoice;
extern alias Erp_Contracts_BO_ARPromissoryNotes;
extern alias Erp_Contracts_BO_ARInvSearch;
extern alias Erp_Contracts_BO_ARInvcDtlSearch;
extern alias Erp_Contracts_BO_Company;
extern alias Erp_Contracts_BO_Customer;
extern alias Erp_Contracts_BO_Part;

using System;
using System.ComponentModel;
using System.Data;
using System.Diagnostics;
using System.Windows.Forms;
using Erp.Adapters;
using Erp.UI;
using Ice.Lib;
using Ice.Adapters;
using Ice.Lib.Customization;
using Ice.Lib.ExtendedProps;
using Ice.Lib.Framework;
using Ice.Lib.Searches;
using Ice.UI.FormFunctions;

//eb1:
using System.Collections.Generic;

public class Script
{
	// ** Wizard Insert Location - Do Not Remove 'Begin/End Wizard Added Module Level Variables' Comments! **
	// Begin Wizard Added Module Level Variables **

	private EpiBaseAdapter oTrans_adapter;
	private EpiDataView edvInvcDtl;

    private string FiscalYear = string.Empty; 
	// End Wizard Added Module Level Variables **

	// Add Custom Module Level Variables Here **

	public void InitializeCustomCode()
	{
		// ** Wizard Insert Location - Do not delete 'Begin/End Wizard Added Variable Initialization' lines **
		// Begin Wizard Added Variable Initialization

		this.oTrans_adapter = ((EpiBaseAdapter)(this.csm.TransAdaptersHT["oTrans_adapter"]));
		this.oTrans_adapter.AfterAdapterMethod += new AfterAdapterMethod(this.oTrans_adapter_AfterAdapterMethod);
		this.edvInvcDtl = ((EpiDataView)(this.oTrans.EpiDataViews["InvcDtl"]));
		this.edvInvcDtl.EpiViewNotification += new EpiViewNotification(this.edvInvcDtl_EpiViewNotification);
		// End Wizard Added Variable Initialization

		// Begin Wizard Added Custom Method Calls

		// End Wizard Added Custom Method Calls
	}

	public void DestroyCustomCode()
	{
		// ** Wizard Insert Location - Do not delete 'Begin/End Wizard Added Object Disposal' lines **
		// Begin Wizard Added Object Disposal

		this.oTrans_adapter.AfterAdapterMethod -= new AfterAdapterMethod(this.oTrans_adapter_AfterAdapterMethod);
		this.oTrans_adapter = null;
		this.edvInvcDtl.EpiViewNotification -= new EpiViewNotification(this.edvInvcDtl_EpiViewNotification);
		this.edvInvcDtl = null;
		// End Wizard Added Object Disposal

		// Begin Custom Code Disposal

		// End Custom Code Disposal
	}

	private void oTrans_adapter_AfterAdapterMethod(object sender, AfterAdapterMethodArgs args)
	{
		// ** Argument Properties and Uses **
		// ** args.MethodName **
		// ** Add Event Handler Code **

		// ** Use MessageBox to find adapter method name
		// EpiMessageBox.Show(args.MethodName)

		//eb1:		
		switch (args.MethodName)
		{
			case "GetByID":
				List<string> lstInvcDtl = new List<string>();
				string strTestData = "";
				bool blnMatchFound = false;
				foreach(DataRowView row in edvInvcDtl.dataView)
				{
					strTestData = 
						((int)row["OrderNum"]).ToString() +
						"/" +
						((int)row["OrderLine"]).ToString() +
						"/" +
						((decimal)row["DspSellingShipQty"]).ToString();
				
					if(lstInvcDtl.Contains(strTestData))
					{
						blnMatchFound = true;
				
					}
					else
					{
						lstInvcDtl.Add(strTestData);
					}
				}
				if(blnMatchFound)
				{
					DialogResult dialogResult;
					dialogResult = 
						MessageBox.Show("Multiple Invoice lines for the same Sales Order Line.  \r\nDelete Duplicates?",
						"WARNING:  Duplicates found", 
						MessageBoxButtons.YesNo);
					if ((dialogResult == DialogResult.Yes))
					{
						lstInvcDtl.Clear();
				
						foreach(DataRowView row in edvInvcDtl.dataView)
						{
							strTestData = 
								((int)row["OrderNum"]).ToString() +
								"/" +
								((int)row["OrderLine"]).ToString() +
								"/" +
								((decimal)row["DspSellingShipQty"]).ToString();
						
							if(lstInvcDtl.Contains(strTestData))
							{
								row.Delete();
						
							}
							else
							{
								lstInvcDtl.Add(strTestData);
							}
							oTrans.NotifyAll();
						}
				
					}
				
				}
				break;

		}


	}

	private void edvInvcDtl_EpiViewNotification(EpiDataView view, EpiNotifyArgs args)
	{
		// ** Argument Properties and Uses **
		// view.dataView[args.Row]["RepRate1"]
		// args.Row, args.Column, args.Sender, args.NotifyType
		// NotifyType.Initialize, NotifyType.AddRow, NotifyType.DeleteRow, NotifyType.InitLastView, NotifyType.InitAndResetTreeNodes
		if ((args.NotifyType == EpiTransaction.NotifyType.Initialize))
		{
			if ((args.Row > -1))
			{
            

              System.DateTime date1 =  DateTime.Now;
        
              FiscalYear = date1.Year.ToString();

               string SalesRep = view.dataView[args.Row]["SalesRepCode1"].ToString();
           
               //    MessageBox.Show(SalesRep);
                view.dataView[args.Row]["RepRate1"]= GetCommission(FiscalYear, SalesRep);
                     
			}
		}
	}
 


	private double GetCommission(string FiscalYear, string SalesRep)
	{
		try
		{
			// Declare and Initialize EpiDataView Variables
			// Declare and create an instance of the Adapter.
			DynamicQueryAdapter adapterDynamicQuery = new DynamicQueryAdapter(this.oTrans);
			adapterDynamicQuery.BOConnect();
        
			// Declare and Initialize Variables
			// TODO: You may need to replace the default initialization with valid values as required for the BL method call.
			string pcQueryId = "SalesCommInvQry";
             double Comm=0.00;
			Ice.BO.QueryExecutionDataSet ds=new Ice.BO.QueryExecutionDataSet();
			ds.ExecutionParameter.AddExecutionParameterRow("Year",FiscalYear,"int",false,Guid.Empty,"A");
			ds.ExecutionParameter.AddExecutionParameterRow("SalesRep",SalesRep,"string",false,Guid.Empty,"A");
			// Call Adapter method
			adapterDynamicQuery.ExecuteByID(pcQueryId,ds);

			if (adapterDynamicQuery.QueryResults.Tables["Results"].Rows.Count>0)
			{
			   foreach(DataRow item in adapterDynamicQuery.QueryResults.Tables["Results"].Rows)
			  {
				double rate1=Convert.ToDouble(item["Company_Number01"]);
				double rate2=Convert.ToDouble(item["Company_Number02"]);
				double rate3=Convert.ToDouble(item["Company_Number03"]);
				double tier2=Convert.ToDouble(item["Company_Number04"]);
				double tier3=Convert.ToDouble(item["Company_Number05"]);
				double tier1=Convert.ToDouble(item["Company_Number"]);
				double totalamt=Convert.ToDouble(item["Calculated_InvAmt"]);
                
					if(totalamt>0 && totalamt<=tier1) Comm=rate1;
					if(totalamt>tier1 && totalamt<=tier2) Comm=rate2;
					if(totalamt>tier2) Comm=rate3;
			     
				}
		
			}

			// Cleanup Adapter Reference
           
			adapterDynamicQuery.Dispose();

        
         return Comm;
		} catch (System.Exception ex)
		{
           
			ExceptionBox.Show(ex);
           return 0;
		}
	}

	private void ARInvoiceForm_Load(object sender, EventArgs args)
	{
		// Add Event Handler Code

       
	}
}
